original_text: So I ask this: ‘Has God turned away from his people?’ No, certainly, he has not done that! I myself belong to Israel's people. I am a descendant of Abraham and I belong to Benjamin's tribe.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 말하노니 하나님이 자기 백성을 버리셨느냐 그럴 수 없느니라 나도 이스라엘인이요 아브라함의 씨에서 난 자요 베냐민 지파라

sentences.original_text: Has God turned away from his people?
No, certainly, he has not done that!
I myself belong to Israel's people.
I am a descendant of Abraham
and I belong to Benjamin's tribe.
